quest.name: Substitute Tester
journal:
Regitt needs a tank commander for an extended trial.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
objectives: Pilot the Rolling Tankard to the Stay and fire its cannon at the target dummies.

dialogue.name: REGITT
dialogue.text: I, ah, I know this is short notice and all, but...have you got time to help us with an extended trial?

dialogue.name: REGITT
dialogue.text: The bloke we trained to command the tank is, uh, “indisposed” at the moment, and no one else is willing or able to take the wheel. As it were.

dialogue.name: REGITT
dialogue.text: Please, speak with Wamutt, and he'll brief you on the particulars. You're all we've got, Forename!

dialogue.name: WAMUTT
dialogue.text: You're our stand-in? Good, then we can get started!

dialogue.name: WAMUTT
dialogue.text: There's naught to it really: just drive up to the Stay, then blast all the targets with the cannon. Commence trial!

dialogue.name: WAMUTT
dialogue.text: You see, “commence trial” means “bloody go!” Try not to miss any of them dummies.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: A group of crude wooden dummies awaits obliteration... Speak to Wamutt at Watts's Anvil to pilot a Rolling Tankard, then command its main cannon to fire upon the targets.

dialogue.name: REGITT
dialogue.text: The trial went well, then? Targets blown into sufficiently small chunks and all that? Good to hear!

dialogue.name: REGITT
dialogue.text: Our original pilot stumbled in after a few too many mugs, and I couldn't let him near a tank in that condition. There'll be no drinking and firing on my watch!

dialogue.name: REGITT
dialogue.text: Anyway, I'm happy to say we've kept to our testing schedule, and it's all thanks to you!
